Good morning Charlotte ‚òÄÔ∏è

It feels so good to be home. On the way home, I added a new #cityhallselfie from @townofstrasburg, a railroad adjacent Shenandoah County town with no shortage of history and a delightful number of local murals in their historic downtown. https://t.co/S39q2eOOJD
Key to the city is great but has @PAWPatrolMovie ever heard about a #cityhallselfie?
